revised_title: King Gustaf VI Adolf of Sweden: A Scholarly and Artistic Monarch
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of King Gustaf VI Adolf of Sweden, who was a scholar with interests in history, art, and archaeology. He was also a passionate collector of Chinese art and a supporter of Swedish research in Chinese geology and palaeontology. His contributions to the fields of art history and archaeology, as well as his personal collections, made him a significant figure in the world of learning.
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > Royal Biography
